author: cnbc.com
title: Lisanti Capital Growth, LLC Announces Fee Reduction for Dinosaur Lisanti Small Cap Growth Fund (ASCGX) and Name Change
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Lisanti Capital Growth, LLC ("Lisanti"), a certified woman-owned and managed SEC registered investment advisor specializing in US small- and small/mid-cap (SMID) equity growth investing, announced today, that effective February 1, 2018, the Dinosaur Lisanti Small Cap Growth Fund (ASCGX) (the 'Fund"), for which Lisanti is the investment advisor, has reduced the Total Annual Fund Operating Expenses after the contractual Fee Waiver and/or Expense Reimbursement for the Fund to 1.35% through April 30, 2019, as outlined in the Supplement, dated February 1, 2018 to the Prospectus dated May 1, 2017. Total Annual Fund Operating Expenses (gross) is reflected as 3.10%. Simultaneously with this reduction in (net) Fund fees, the Fund has changed its name to the Lisanti Small Cap Growth Fund and the website for the Fund has changed to www.lisantismallcap.com .
Mary Lisanti, President of Lisanti, stated "We are pleased to be able to announce this significant fee reduction for the Fund, along with the change to the Fund name and website. We believe the Fund's past history, combined with the new fee change, will make it even more attractive to a broader range of potential investors. Our tenured portfolio team continues to focus on a top-down theme-based approach with a fundamental bottom-up research process that has been an instrumental driver for our success."
About Lisanti Capital Growth, LLC
Lisanti Capital Growth, LLC, (Lisanti), founded by Mary Lisanti, is a certified woman-owned and managed SEC registered investment advisor specializing in US small- and small/mid-cap (SMID) equity growth investing. In September 2017, Dinosaur Group Holdings, LLC, the parent company of DCM Advisors, LLC, (DCM), an affiliated SEC registered investment advisor providing asset management and wealth advisory services, acquired a minority interest in Lisanti. Lisanti manages separately managed accounts and is the investment adviser to the Lisanti Small Cap Growth Fund (ASCGX). For more information about Lisanti, please visit www.lisanticap.com or email info@lisanticap.com . For information regarding the Lisanti Small Cap Growth Fund (ASCGX), please visit www.lisantismallcap.com or contact a customer service representative at (800) 441-7031.
